name: Alien Vehicle
description:
It is a shooting game, where you move right and left, and shoot targets that appears in front of you.

Controls:

A - move left

 D - move right

Q - turn cannon left

E - turn cannon right

M - shoot

...and you can click LMB on central area of the screen to shoot.

There's three levels in this game, but it's maybe hard to clear them.

You getting extra score for accuracy and for destroying target on distance.

To enable fullscreen press F button in main menu.

PS 3D effects may slow down the game.

Background story: You remove autonomous security systems, that left with no human control.

Textures:

www.virtual-lands-3d.com
https://3dtextures.me

I used hdr images converted to png from this web-site:

https://hdrihaven.com/

Music:

MAKOOTO （マクート）

MFP【Marron Fields Production】

かずち (カズチ）

https://dova-s.jp

This game made with LibGDX.

Models made with Blender.

Support option is here - HeligearGames
